column4: evening folks. I'm having problems opening .mp4 files from YouTube. :(
when I open it with movie player or gxine... movie player just "goes away" ... and gxine just loads and does nothing. :(
ah, manually opening through mplayer ... I get "Error opening/initializing the selected video_out (-vo) device. any ideas?
mplayer>preferences>video>X11/xv ,maybe other will work for you
thx... didn't work... but thank you for making suggestions. ;-)
did you try with other drivers you have to restart mplayer after every change you make
it seems that I may be missing the video codec
yeah... it says its already installed
how can I get it to reinstall?
in synaptic mark mplayer for reinstall
will that fix all the codecs? I have the codec problem in just about all the video players
yes. 0 upgraded, 0 newly installed, 0 to remove and 0 not upgraded.
honestly... I'm about ready to give up and try to reinstall the whole boat.
that will not solve problem you can fix it without reinstall if it is audio then in preferences>codecs&demuxer>audio codec family>ffmpeg
there are numerous problems though... my webcam won't work anymore... I can't play most desktop videos... I get errors about permissions on my home directory when I login... :-\
lots of experimentation to get things working has broken lots of things unf.
you can always ask on forums qestion by question but if you want to reinstall feel free to do it
